data.title: mariah — Frank Iero's Tattoos
data.text:
Tattoo: Rising Sun style sun with a black rose and a swirl of handguns

Location: Left elbow

Date: January-March 2004

Tattoo: Chainsaw

Location: Left bicep

Date: January-June 2004

He said, “I really like the chainsaw that’s around my left bicep. I’m not exactly sure how much of a bicep it is, but the tattoo came out really well. The chainsaw came from The Texas Chainsaw Massacre, which is one of my favorite movies of all time. It also represents a revenge theme to me, the balance of power, or rather redressing the balance of power”

Tattoo: “i’m so sorry”

Location: Left arm

Date: January-June 2004

Tattoo: Bomb

Location: Left arm

Date: January-June 2004

Tattoo: Devil and angel swallows

Location: Hips

Date: 2004

Tattoo: NJ anchor

Location: Right arm

Date: July-August 2004

He said, “Me and three of my friends all had the NJ with the anchor done at the same time. It means always being anchored to home in New Jersey, it was something we needed to do.”

Hambone from Pencey Prep was one of the friends.

Tattoo: NJ

Location: Inside lower lip

Date: 2004

He said, “I had the inside of my lip done with the NJ. I guess it’s a way of remembering your roots, and being honest, true to yourself, and down to earth.”

Tattoo: “live each day as if it were your last”

Location: Leg

Date: 2004

He said, “Actually, I have a lot of personal things tattooed on me such as poetry that I’ve written. The newest one I got, that I really like a lot, is down on my thigh and it says “Live every day like it’s your last.”

Tattoo: “x jamia x”

Location: Chest

Date: 2004

Tattoo: “Keep the Faith”

Location: Back

Date: February-April 2005

Tattoo: The Misfits logo

Location: Left shin

Date: 2005

Tattoo: HALLOWEEN

Location: Knuckles

Date: March-April 2005

Tattoo: Ghost of You “forget me not”

Location: Right bicep

Date: May-June 2005

He said, “I got the ‘Forget me not,’ after we did the Ghost of You. We were in this boat and it started sinking. I really thought that we were done for. We were all dress up as soldiers and the boat started to capsize and water came up to my chest but I got pulled out. I remember my life passing before my eyes and kind of accepting my faith. I got the tattoo to remember that feeling of the end and that I was pretty OK with it. I found out that I wasn’t afraid of death. It was scary, I mean I shit myself but at the same time it was a relief. I thought OK, it’s time to go and I was fine with it. I think I’ve done a lot of things that I’ve always wanted to do and I was happy with the way I lived my life. It was the worst tattoo to get. I had the day off and the next day I had to go and play and it had swollen up and it just felt like my entire arm was just jiggling as I was playing. It was awful. For some reason my upper arms don’t heal as well as the rest of the body.”

Tattoo: “Search And Destroy”

Location: Waist

Date: August 2005

He said, “Search And Destroy, around my waist, is the way I feel every time I play live. Basically I go out there and destroy everything. It’s also a Henry Rollins’ thing. It makes me feel empowered. It’s a different mindset, it’s almost a meditation, You don’t see a lot or hear a lot while you’re doing it, you kind of get caught up in the moment. It’s definitely an enlightenment, I think. If you don’t come off the stage feeling completely drained of everything you haven’t been doing it right.”

Henry Rollins, former frontman of Black Flag, had the phrase tattooed on his back. Rollins used the phrase as a philosophy of life - search for what you want out of life and destroy any obstacle that gets in your way.

This is Henry Rollins’ “Search and Destroy” tattoo on his back.

Tattoo: s//c - Skeleton Crew logo

Location: Left side of his neck (behind his ear)

Date: 2005

He said, “Behind my left ear is the logo for Skeleton Crew, a company that I started. It’s a record label, book publishing and clothing company and that’s my most recent tattoo.”

Tattoo:”revenge”

Location: Left inner wrist

Date: December 2005

He said, “One of my best friends is James Deweeses who sings for Reggie And The Full Effect who toured with us on the Warped tour. We’ve got matching “revenge” tattoos. Cool, huh?”

Both tattoos pictured above.

Tattoo: “F.T.W.”

Location: Right arm

Date: 2006

F.T.W. meaning Fuck The World

Tattoo: Cobra

Location: Right arm

Date: 2006

Tattoo: LA 5-25-06

Location: Right arm

Date: April-December 2006

It may commemorate the date and location that Frank proposed to Jamia.

Tattoo: Eagle with an engagement ring

Location: Right arm

Date: April-December 2006

Tattoo: Frankenstein full-body

Location: Right arm

Date: December 2006

Tattoo: Frankenstein stitches

Location: Right wrist

Date:January-March 2007

Tattoo: Skull and crossbones

Location: Right hand

Date:January-March 2007

Tattoo: Scissors with “Jinx Removing” and 2-5-07 on a banner

Location: left side of his neck

Date: between February 23, 2007 and March 1, 2007

The date on the banner looks to be 2-5-07 but many fansites (and fans) have listed the date as 3-7-2007.

The date may refer to the date that Frank and Jamia got married which was on February 5, 2007.

The other date, 3-7-2007, is actually Mikey’s wedding date.

Jinx Removing is a Jawbreaker song from 24 Hour Revenge Therapy.

Fans have speculated that the scissors, date, and song title represent breaking the jinx that is associated with having “relationship” tattoos. Frank has Jamia’s name tattooed on him, and Mikey and Alicia got matching tattoos.

Frank wore a tshirt that said ‘jinx removing’ and had Jamia’s name on it on the Conan O’Brien Show.

Tattoo: Bloody tooth

Location: Right arm

Date: February-May 2007

Tattoo: “I Am a Graveyard” chest bpiece

Location: Chest

Date: March-August 2007

Tattoo: Grandfather portrait

Location: Left arm

Date: July-August 2007

Tattoo: Wolf head - The Banner logo

Location: Right arm

Date:August 2007

Tattoo:”Hopeless” with a spider web

Location: Right hand

Date: August 2007

Tattoo:”Romantic” with half of a heart

Location: Right hand

Date: August 2007

Tattoo:Heart with arrow and “Jamia” on the banner

Location: Right hand

Date: August 2007

Tattoo: Smiley face balloon

Location: Right arm

Date: March - April 2008

Tattoo: Two portraits

Location: Right arm

Date: April 2008

The two portraits feature the words: “Forever in my Heart” above the tattoos, “Angelina” below the first portrait, and “Lillian” below the second portrait.

They are rumored to be his grandmothers.

If I missed any let me know!
